lessons.title: 51. Hello, Universe!
lessons.description: Practice printing another message. Print Hello, Universe! exactly.
lessons.tutorial: Using System.out.println again reinforces how console output works.

lessons.title: Python 1. Hello, World
lessons.description: Print Hello, World! in Python using print().
lessons.initialCode:
# Write a Python program to print Hello, World!
print("Hello, World!")  # replace me if needed
lessons.tutorial: In Python, use print() to output text.
